    bool find(obj_id_t obj_id) {
        auto it = obj2iter.find(obj_id);
        if (it == obj2iter.end()) return false;
        auto node = *(it->second);
        lfu_set.erase(it->second);
        node.freq += 1;
        node.timestamp = ++time_counter;
        auto iter = lfu_set.insert(LFUNode(node.freq, node.timestamp, node.size, node.obj_id)).first;
        obj2iter[obj_id] = iter;

        // Promote "aging" occasionally even on find, to prevent staleness in ultra-hot cache
        // (Very light touch: once per 4096th access, do a quick pass for slight freq decay if size is large)
        static uint64_t find_access_counter = 0;
        if ((++find_access_counter & 0xFFF) == 0 && lfu_set.size() > 128) {
            std::vector<LFUNode> aged_nodes;
            for (const auto& n : lfu_set) {
                LFUNode m = n;
                if (m.freq >= 32) m.freq = (m.freq + 1) / 2;
                aged_nodes.push_back(m);
            }
            lfu_set.clear();
            obj2iter.clear();
            for (const auto& n : aged_nodes) {
                auto it2 = lfu_set.insert(n).first;
                obj2iter[n.obj_id] = it2;
            }
        }

        return true;
    }
